title: Colorado National Monument: 2nd Grade
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Field Trips     2nd Grade                  2nd Grade       Download: Second Grade Program   Example Field Trip Schedule  Pre/Post Worksheets *Actual schedules will depend upon the number of students, ranger availability, time available for the field trip, and length of programs chosen.   Â    Program Option: Habitats in No Thoroughfare Canyon (3 miles, 4 hours)  No Thoroughfare Canyon How do toads survive the winter? Where do lizards find shelter in the summer? During this hike, students will investigate how organisms interact with the ecosystem and how they respond to changing seasons.  Science 2.1, 2.2, 3.1
